Title: Relates to the sale, lease or other disposition of property of the city, the NYC department of education, the NYC educational construction fund and the NYC school construction authority
Summary: Relates to the sale, lease or other disposition of property of the New York city department of education, New York city educational construction fund and the New York city school construction authority; requires all disposition to be subject to New York city's uniform land use review procedure and requires prior notification and community consultation.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to the sale, lease or other disposition of property of the New York city department of education, the New York city educational construction fund and the New York city school construction authority
